review: wrost app wrost resturants I placed an order at the wrong location and then immediately tried to cancel the order They did not refund the money and deducted all the money as payment cancellation fees. wrost food delivery app

Instamart has been surprisingly good. Delivery is fast, items are usually fresh, and the service feels more reliable than expected. Orders arrive on time, substitutions are sensible, and the overall experience is smooth. Compared to regular grocery runs or other quick-commerce apps, Instamart clearly does better on consistency.
